From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Indian Hindi Language film


AteetDirected byTanuj BhramarWritten byHarsshil R PatelProduced byAnil Somani  Pramod Goyal  Anup Todi  Ashish WaghStarringPriyamani RajSanjay SuriRajeev KhandelwalCinematographyMukesh G.Edited byMayur HardasMusic byAndrew T. MackayHarish SagneDistributed byZEE5Release date
21 April 2020 (2020-04-21)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Ateet is a 2020 Indian Hindi-language war drama film starring Priyamani which streams on ZEE5. It is a story of a soldier who was lost in a war and declared dead, after several years he returns to his family, now a question occurs whether he is alive or dead.[1][2]


Plot[edit]
The story is about Captain Ateet Rana[3] who was declared killed in action, Vishwa Karma his senior decides to take care of his wife Janvi and daughter Sana. After 10 years of hiding details about Ateet from Sana, in a twist of fate Ateet Rana returns and wants his family back and is ready to expose a dark truth about his senior Vishwa Karma.[4]

Cast[edit]
Priyamani as Janvi
Sanjay Suri as Vishwa Karma
Rajeev Khandelwal as Ateet Rana
Vipin Sharma as Dr. Masood
Soundtrack[edit]
The soundtrack is produced by Harish Sagne.[5]
The film contains singers like Sonu Nigam Yamini Sri Devi Yasser Desai and Sonu Kakkar

^ "Ateet Review – A Tacky Drama With a Horror-Twist". binged.com. 21 April 2020.
